text: Joseph Franklin Ada (born December 3, 1943), better known as Joseph F. Ada, is an American politician. He was the 5th Governor of Guam from 1987 to 1995. He was the 3rd Lieutenant Governor of Guam from 1979 to 1983. He is a member of the Republican Party of Guam. ==References== ==Other websites== * Joseph F. Ada Bio at Guampedia, Guam's Online Encyclopedia Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Guam Category:Lieutenant Governors of Guam Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Joseph F. Ada
